comment.body: @ciras  well its a router  so its made to grant acces and redirect mostly   the idea is to fit those tools in order to slowly get yourself decentralized

> [ciras](#comment_2_1CwMXL15QsqkuBXjigK4EWfPJ81wwSXjqn): so do I have to be on i2p 24/7? bc when PC shut down all connection gone

yes cause i2p its like a d-link router  if you turn your router off at home you loos connection same thing here
